PROFILE  
 
 
I am an enthusiastic and professional who enjoys being part of, as well as leading a successful and productive team. I am 
quick to grasp new ideas and concepts; and developi ng innovative and creative solutions to problems. Able to work well 
on my own initiative and can demonstrate the high levels of motivation required to meet the tightest of deadlines  
 
OBJECTIVE  
 
 
Looking to build on my technical and personal skills within a suitably challenging role, and Keen to  
achieve further professional development.  
 
TRAINING AND QUALIFICATIONS  
 
 
Bachelor’s degree in   Electrical Engineering                                                                          2005 -2009  
Makerere Un iversity   
 
Ordinary Diploma in Telecommunications Engineering                                                        2007 -2009  
Uganda Institute of Communication and Technology Nakawa  
 
Certificate of a Radio and Television Electronics and Technology                                       2005 -2006  
                (PRT 1 & 2)

Nakawa Vocational Training Institute

Uganda Martyrs’ High School Lubaga                                                                                        2002 -2003  
  
Uganda certificate of education  (U.C.E)                                                                                  1999 -2002  
 
 
PROFFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
 
o  Training in cleaner production,reneweable energy and low cost productions by Uganda 
cleaner production under UNIDO  
o Demonstrable  competence and experience of working ind ependently with good attention to 
details and ability and willingness to follow protocol with engineering ethics  
o Span of control above 100 staff  
o Corporate planning and monthly appraisals with in depth analysis  
 
o Good skills in fault diagnosing on machines  
o Demonstrable  competence  and experienced knowledge of industrial health ,safety and 
environmental concepts and fire  fighting skills  
o Computer literate.  
o Administrative skills  
o Good communication skill   
WORK EXPERIENCE  
 
 
Up to date:  Maintenance Supervisor  
            Sadolin Paints Uganda limited  
           Plot 8,2nd Street, Industrial Area  
           P.O.BOX 4627 Kampala, Uganda  
Duties;  
o Report to management  
o Oversee all repairs in the factory  
o Oversee all maintenance activities in the factory  
o Outsource sp are parts  
o Assign duties in the maintenance department  
o Plan dairy,weekly,monthly and annual maintenance programmes  
o Oversee machine operation  
o Oversee health and safety in the factory  
 
 Project Supervisor  
         FIRE WORLD UGANDA LIMITED  
         Plot 17 Faraday Rd, Bugolobi  
         P.O.BOX 34651  
         Kampala, Uganda  
 
Duties:  
o Oversee all company projects  
o Make project report  
o Supervise all site works  
o Co-ordinate with the contractors  
o Plan project work plans  
o Source materials to be used  
o Over see health an d safety  
o Plan installations  
 
 
 Electrical / Effluent treatment supervisor  
               PHENIX LOGISTICS UGANDA LTD  
                P.O .Box 4378 K’LA  
 
Duties;  
 
o Supervisor all work in the effluent treatment plant and electrical section.  
o Assist in the for mulation and implementation of the production plan.  
o Execute installations, servicing, maintenance and repair of machines  
o Over see the function of machine setting, operating quality control and packaging of various 
products  
o Enforce safety control measures t o ensure that the operational safety of all company 
machines and equipment and safety of all staff  
o Initiate production process improvement s and submit them for approval before applying 
them  
o Heads generator ,electrical generally and some  mechanical units  
o Perform pre operational inspection of generator set and system.  
o Adjust protective relays and circuit breakers to meet system requirement where necessary.  
o Complete all required forms, reports and other necessary paper work in a timely manner as 
required.  o Respond to user inquires in a courteous manner, provide information with in the area of 
assignment, and resolve complaints in an efficient and timely manner.  
o Estimate time, materials and equipment required for jobs assigned; requisition materials 
as required . 
 
o Report and handle operating plant and facility emergencies in accordance with established 
procedures as necessary.
